document.full_text: strangulation, common in domestic abuse cases, is now a crime in new york and already 2,000 people have been arrested under the weeks-old law, authorities said on thursday.
document.title: new york law now makes choking a crime, results in 2,000 arrests
lines_and_colors: strangulation, common in domestic abuse cases, is now a crime in new york and already 2,000 people have been arrested under the weeks-old law, authorities said on thursday.
